给…加润滑油；加油；上油；使顺畅；涂抹油料以保护或使光亮

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指动物性脂肪，常为固态。
通常指经加热变柔软的油脂。
泛指植物、动物和矿物性液体油。

word_group.brief_definition: (尤指在商业上或政治上)起促进作用
石油钻塔；海上石油平台
石油类液体燃料发动机

bilingual.source: Heat the oil over a high heat.
Humans catch whales for meat, fat and oil.
bilingual.target: 人类捕鲸是为了获取肉、脂肪和油。

bilingual.source: Water and oil do not mix because oil is nonpolar.
bilingual.target: 水和油不混合，因为油是非极性的。

bilingual.source: The dipstick reading showed that the oil level was fine.
Oil has a higher viscosity than water.
I spilled the oil on the floor.
bilingual.target: 我把油洒出在地板上了。

bilingual.source: Farmers plant rapeseed in the spring for its valuable oil.
bilingual.target: 农民在春天种植油菜籽，因为它的油很有价值。

list.abstract: oil，英 [ɔɪl]，美 [ɔɪl]。英语词语，作名词，是指汽油；润滑油；油画。作动词，是指用油润滑；给…涂油；加油。短语搭配为：“oil paint（油画颜料）”。例句为：“It uses olive oil in cooking.（它在烹饪中使用橄榄油）”。 oil近义词为petroleum，melt，thaw out。
oil，姓名ThanaSuttikamol，泰国男演员，歌手（组合Lift&Oil）出生地泰国曼谷。

yingyinNormal.en: Some light soy sauce, some groundnut oil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一些生抽，一些花生油。

yingyinNormal.en: The wok is nice and hot. A little bit of oil. You can use groundnut oil or vegetable oil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 锅热后，倒入一些油，用花生油或植物油都可以。

yingyinNormal.en: But we did bring you holy oil from…
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们给您带来了圣油...

yingyinNormal.en: I've got here some ground nut oil. You can use vegetable oil, sunflower oil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 往锅内倒入一点花生油，也可以选用菜籽油或葵花油。

yingyinNormal.en: Wok on, oil in. Now, the oil is nice and hot, we can add the meatballs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 起锅，倒油。现在油热了，我们放入肉丸。

yingyinNormal.en: So in with some corn oil. Okay. Give that a good swirl. This is really simple, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 倒点玉米油，晃一圈锅中的油，这很容易，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Set all but two tablespoons of oil aside for the sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 留两汤匙油做酱汁用。

yingyinNormal.en: Wok on, oil in, and cut up the dofu into small slices.
yingyinNormal.zh: 起锅，倒油，将豆腐切条。

yingyinNormal.en: Lovely. And in with a little bit of oil. While that's getting nice and hot, I'm gonna marinate the pork.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常好，倒点油。在加热油的同时，我要腌渍猪肉。

yingyinNormal.en: And some soy and some oil, and just give that a good mix.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再加点酱油和油，好好搅拌一下。

yingyinNormal.en: You know when the wok's hot enough, when you start to see a little bit of smoke just coming off the surface of the oil and sometimes you can see the oil glisten as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 油表面开始冒出一点白烟时，你就知道锅已经热得差不多了，有时候也会看到油开始发亮。

yingyinNormal.en: So, wok lovely and hot. In with some groundnut oil. About a tablespoon or two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 锅已经烧热了。倒入花生油，大约一到两汤匙。

yingyinNormal.en: A hot and sour soup base gotta have the hot, so it gotta have the chilli. Oil into the wok.
yingyinNormal.zh: 酸辣汤底要有辣味，所以得放辣椒。放一些油。

yingyinNormal.en: You can take some caster oil, there's eating spicy foods. Great. We will do all of those.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以喝麻子油，吃辣的食物。我们全部都愿意。

yingyinNormal.en: Oil in. Once it's nice and smoking, in with the egg. Now I'll just swirl this around a little bit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放油，烧热冒烟了之后，放蛋液。把锅稍微转一转。

yingyinNormal.en: Spoon the oil over the top to help brown them. Put the brown meatballs in an ovenproof dish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把油淋到肉丸上，令其充分受热。把炸成金黄的肉丸放到烤盘里。

yingyinNormal.en: Now to cook the marinated beef. Wok on, oil in. Wok is ready. It's smoking. In with the beef.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在炒腌好的牛肉。放上锅，倒些油，锅热了，冒烟了，放入牛肉。

yingyinNormal.en: In with about a tablespoon, for two of groundnut oil. And this is my second store cupboard ingredient.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在锅里倒入一到两汤匙花生油，这是我的第二种厨房必备调料。

yingyinNormal.en: Fantastic. And then for fragrance and smokiness, some bacon, just diced. Wok on, oil in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，现在为了增加烟熏风味，加一点刚刚切碎的培根。架起锅，倒进油。

yingyinNormal.en: So now we work for The Hulk? That's what we're doing? Why do I smell baby oil?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在为绿巨人卖力了? 那就是我们的工作？我怎么闻到一股婴儿润肤油的味道?

exam_freq_info.chinese: 食用油; 润滑油; 油类

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It gave birth to the <highlight>oil</highlight> drilling industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它催生了石油钻探行业。

examination_example.sentence: There was <highlight>oil</highlight> leakage along the Gulf Coast.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海湾沿岸出现了石油泄漏。

examination_example.sentence: There were <highlight>oil</highlight> deposits below a local gassy hill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地一座多气的小山下有石油储藏。

sense_info_list.zh: 食用油; 润滑油; 油类

sense_info_list.en: rub on or lubricate with a greasy substance

examination_example.sentence: What do critics think of Mexican <highlight>oil</highlight> company's bonus policy?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 评论员如何看待墨西哥石油公司的奖金政策？

examination_example.sentence: Who will qualify for the bonus in Mexican <highlight>oil</highlight> company?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁有资格获得墨西哥石油公司的奖金?

examination_example.sentence: Workers at Mexican <highlight>oil</highlight> company will receive a healthy incentive of almost $300 a year if they meet certain body weight standards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 墨西哥石油公司的员工如果达到一定的体重标准，每年将获得近300美元的健康激励。

sense_info_list.zh: 食用油; 润滑油; 油类

examination_example.sentence: Kids bringing your lunch wrapped in a cloth, in <highlight>oiled</highlight> paper, in a little wooden box was a very long- standing rural tradition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们把你的午餐包在布里、油纸里、小木箱里，这是一个非常悠久的农村传统。

examination_example.sentence: Then add a little <highlight>oil</highlight> and salt.
